caption.p: Photomicrograph of liver. (a) (non-diabetic non-treated) No visible lesion, (b) diabetic non-treated showed congestion and necrosis, (c) daily oral gavage showed infiltration of inflammatory cells and congestion. (d) DTMC200 showed moderate infiltration of inflammatory cells while (e) DTMC400 showed moderate infiltration of inflammatory cells (400Ã—, H and E).
